WEATHER FORECAST FOR 28 JULY 2025
Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 27 July 2025

S
 
 
everal spells of showers will occur in Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Kaluthara, Galle
and Matara districts.

A
 few showers may occur in North-western province and in Colombo and Gampaha districts.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Uva and Eastern provinces during the
afternoon or night.

F
airly strong winds of about 40 kmph can be expected at times over Western slopes of the central
hills and in Northern, North-central and North-western provinces and in Hambantota district.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to  minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
